a.title: New School Project
a.style: padding-top: 3px; display: block; width: 84px; height: 81px; text-align: center;

h3.style: background: rgb(0, 51, 153); margin: 0px; padding: 10px 10px 10px 15px; text-align: center; letter-spacing: 2px; font-family: bebas_neueregular; font-size: 36px; font-weight: normal;

div.h3: click on banner BELOW for latest updates

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: We have updated our FAQ with the latest graduation information - dates of the virtual celebrations, cap and gown pick-ups, and picture submissions. Please follow this link.

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Please join us for a virtual town hall meeting on April 28th at 4:30pm to hear the results of the high school branding survey, ask questionsand learn about the next steps. You canREGISTER HERE.Identity expert John Jenson will share the results of a branding survey which elicited 4,000 responses. Viewers can submit questions using live Q&A.

div.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); word-break: break-word; overflow-wrap: break-word; text-align: center;
div.span: The PACT program is offered at 10 schools in the SCH. We have 8 half day programs and 2 full day programs. The only two requirements are that you live in Hammond and your child will be 4 years old by August 1, 2020. In the meantime, enjoy one of our classes rocking out with Miss Kriss, who teaches music in every classroom once a month.

div.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 4px; line-height: 4px; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-align: center;

margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: Calibri, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center;

margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: Calibri, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center;

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: This is the formal School City of HammondContinuous Learning Planas required by the Indiana Department of Education.

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: The School City of Hammond will partner with the Indiana Online Academy for high school credit obtainment again this summer. All SCH high schools will host opportunities for students to take classes virtually through IOA. Students should reach out to their counselors or administrators to register for the classes. Due to the pandemic, we are unsure of the format for the final examns.

img.title: FoodServices
img.br:
Sites:
Edison Elementary, Franklin Elementary, Harding Elementary, Irving Elementary, Maywood Elementary and Morton Elementary

strong.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana; font-size: x-large; text-align: center;

span.strong: Hammond School and Building Closure Information

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 33, 33);
span.span: 3/19 UPDATE: In compliance with the order from Indiana Governor Eric Holcomb, all School City of Hammond schools will remain closed until May 1st, 2020. The Governor indicated that he would re-evaluate that date as the crisis unfolds over the next several weeks. He also announced state testing will be cancelled for the 19-20 school year. SCH will continue it's current eLearning plan through 5/1.

em.span: ALL BUILDINGS WILL BE CLOSED until May 1st.

span.style: text-align: center; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(33, 33, 33);

span.a:
ParentSquare:
School and District Communication
with Parents and Guardians

img.title: PSReg
img.style: width: 150px; height: 150px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: x-large; background-color: rgb(38, 38, 38);

p.span:
All students need to fill out their annual registration information online. Families will receive a letter from school with a code and then need to click on the link to go through the process. Letters, computers and assistance will be available in each school.
PowerSchool Registration - English
PowerSchool Registration- Spanish
________________________________________________________

div.style: border-width: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; left: 284px; top: 4px; width: 1px; height: 1px; overflow: hidden; position: absolute;

table.style: border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica; font-size: 13.33px; border-top-width: 1px; border-left-width: 1px; border-collapse: collapse;

p.span: Excellence in learning: Success in life.

The School City of Hammond embraces its diversity and communicates consistently high expectations. SCH provides a rich and challenging learning environment that encourages academic excellence and the development of talents that prepares students to make positive contributions to our world.

District leadership provides continuous, system-wide, professional growth opportunities enhanced by technology and guided by data-driven, research-based strategies, assessments, and timely interventions. Highly effective teachers and support staff collaboratively utilize best practices to maximize student growth and achievement.
Supported by the pillars of sound, fiscal management, accountability, and community partnerships, SCH maintains a focus on transparency and good stewardship.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: rgb(236, 236, 236); font-family: latobold; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: Excellence in learning: Success in life.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: rgb(236, 236, 236); font-family: latobold; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: The School City of Hammond embraces its diversity and communicates consistently high expectations. SCH provides a rich and challenging learning environment that encourages academic excellence and the development of talents that prepares students to make positive contributions to our world.

District leadership provides continuous, system-wide, professional growth opportunities enhanced by technology and guided by data-driven, research-based strategies, assessments, and timely interventions. Highly effective teachers and support staff collaboratively utilize best practices to maximize student growth and achievement.
Supported by the pillars of sound, fiscal management, accountability, and community partnerships, SCH maintains a focus on transparency and good stewardship.

a.title: HEF

div.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px calc((100% - 980px) * 0.5); padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: 0px 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; left: 112px; width: 756px; position: absolute; pointer-events: none; top: 126px;

p.style: margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: 0px 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 21px; line-height: normal; font-family: "open sans", sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 48, 91); pointer-events: auto; text-align: center;

span.style: font-weight: bold; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: 0px 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Every child in Hammond deserves access to a qualitypublic education.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: 0px 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 18px; line-height: normal; font-family: "open sans", sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 48, 91); pointer-events: auto; text-align: center;

margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: 0px 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal; font-family: "open sans", sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 48, 91); pointer-events: auto; text-align: center;

span.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: 0px 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span:
In order to make that visiona reality in the School City of Hammond, a district where a majority of the students are enrolled in the free and reduced lunch program, we must recruit, train, and retain the very best educators.We believe that an empowered teaching force is the lever in addressing the very real gaps affecting our school district and community. Our investments reflect that belief.
___________________________________________________________

span.style: text-align: center; background-color: rgb(236, 236, 236); font-family: Arial; font-size: 10px; color: rgb(0, 51, 153);

div.span:
It is the policy of the School City of Hammond not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, national origin,age or handicap in its programs as required by the Indiana Civil Rights Act (I.C. 22-9.1), Title VI and VII (Civil Rights Act of 1964, Title IX (Educational Amendments), and Section 504 (Rehabilitation Act of 1973).
Si usted necesita informacin acerca del School City of Hammond (las escuelas pblicas de Hammond), de alguna escuela de nuestro distrito en particular, o de algn programa en espaol u otro idioma, por favor, llame a nuestro departamento de educacin bilinge si necesita ayuda al (219) 933-2455.
